title: Detoxification (Detox) Services - LifeStream
description: Help with the cost of detoxification and assist someone in their recovery process.
cleaned_text: Description Drug and alcohol misuse, abuse, or addiction can devastate a life. Support and assistance through acute life-threatening withdrawal from alcohol and opioids/heroin use is an essential part of the recovery process. Psychiatric and nursing care, medication, and monitoring of detoxification symptoms enable individuals to safely withdraw from addictive substances.
